job_title: Salesforce Business Analyst with SOX Compliance
jd: From: Sunil Yadav, Tanisha Systems Inc. syadav@tanishasystems.com Reply to: syadav@tanishasystems.com Job Tittle: Salesforce Business Analyst with SOX ComplianceLocation: Palo Alto, CA - HybridHire Type: Contract Job Description:This role is for a Salesforce Business Analyst (who have salesforce admin certification) + SOX KnowledgeThis is not a pure technical role. This role is more functional. Need BA experience.Client is working 3 days per week onsite. Hence this person needs to be onsite 3 days per week in Palo Alto, CA for coordination. (Remote or occasional travel will not be accepted here.)Client needs a BA who will take charge of processes and communication with cross functional team – will interact to find out why something is needed and what purpose.Need good understanding of SOX. Differentiate between SOX objects and non-SOX objects.Need to understand what compliance is. Good understanding of security. Regards,Sunil Yadav - Tanisha Systems Inc. (TSI)Office - (732) 369-9543Email : syadav@tanishasystems.com
